patthana8.2:1.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ,
patthana8.2:1.1_1: ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā,
patthana8.2:1.1_2: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ.
patthana8.2:1.1_3: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana8.2:1.1_5: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:2.1_0: Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.2:3.1_0: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:3.1_1: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:3.1_2: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.2:6.1_0: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:6.1_1: Nasahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:6.1_2: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa ca naahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:7.1_0: Naahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana8.2:8.1_0: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.2:9.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri,
patthana8.2:9.1_1: anantare nava …pe… sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme …pe… jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha,
